title: Does anyone know how much the new project skins will be with borders?
body: Title, I am trying to figure out the cost of the skin with the border. Trying to figure out how much money to put in.

replies.body: If it is anything like the last Project-skinline, the border will not cost you anything additionally but will be restricted to people who bought the skins shortly after release.
It doesn't quite look like all the info has come out quite yet, but we should start getting details soon!
